mapper.select: select pp.board_no, pp.thumbnail, pp.homepage, pp.readable, pb.title, pb.registered_date, pb.view_count, pm.id, pgm.seeking_flag, pgm.career, pps.member_skill_no, ps.skill_no, ps.name, (select count(*) from pf_recommendation as pr where pr.board_no=pp.board_no) as like_count from pf_portfolio as pp join pf_board as pb on pp.board_no=pb.board_no join pf_members as pm on pp.general_member_no=pm.member_no join pf_general_member as pgm on pm.member_no=pgm.general_member_no left outer join pf_portfolio_skill as pps on pp.board_no=pps.board_no left outer join pf_member_skill as pms on pps.member_skill_no=pms.member_skill_no left outer join pf_skill as ps on pms.skill_no=ps.skill_no left outer join pf_field as pf on ps.field_no=pf.field_no where readable=1 order by view_count desc;

readable=1
and
ps.name=#{item}
like_count desc pb.view_count desc
